detail_desc: Fitted cardigan in a soft, fine, rib-knit viscose blend with a collar and buttons down the front.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in a Tencel™ lyocell and silk weave containing glittery metal threads. Small stand-up collar with a decorative drawstring at the front, buttons at the top and a concealed zip at the back. Long sleeves with elasticated, flounced cuffs, and pleats at the hem. Recycled polyester lining.

Knee-length, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front with a decorative tie detail at one side. Long sleeves and an asymmetric hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Narrow belt in metal decorated with sparkly stones. Adjustable buckle. Width approx. 1.5 cm.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch cotton blend with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and half-string back.
Short shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Leather sandals with crossover straps at the front. Leather insoles and rubber soles.
Jumper in a soft knit with a drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Playsuit in plumeti chiffon made from recycled polyester containing glittery threads. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and concealed press-stud at the front. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip in one side and long puff sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam and a detachable belt with a heart-shaped, beaded buckle at the waist, and a small frill trim at the hems. Jersey lining.
Glittery hair set with two hair clips and four hair elastics. Hair clips in metal with a butterfly detail. Length 5 cm. Hair elastics without metal clips, two with a butterfly detail.
V-neck blouse in a gently draping viscose weave with buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam and flounce at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Ankle-length treggings in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with a ribbed, easy pull-on, elasticated waist. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Mules in imitation leather with crossover straps at the top. Gently moulded imitation cork insoles and chunky ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.

Jersey-lined joggers in a soft weave made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and flap leg pockets. Wide, straight legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from Tencel™ lyocell with a small stand-up collar.
Short shorts in jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and frill-trimmed hems.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Long metal earrings with flower-shaped pendants. Length 8 cm.
Earrings with a round metal disc at the top and large, resin, shell-shaped pendants. Length approx. 7 cm.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Scarf in a wool weave with a lightly felted finish and fringes along the short sides. Size 32x180 cm.
Soft, non-wired bra with unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.

Short-sleeved romper suit in organic cotton slub jersey with buttons at the shoulders and a small print motif at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, long legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Round-necked T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy cotton jersey with an embroidered motif on the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
KELZUKI x H&M. Joggers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, back pocket and ribbed hems.
Set with a hat and mittens knitted in a soft cotton blend. Hat with ears on top, embroidered details at the front and a ribbed hem. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Size 2-6M without thumbs.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a large faux fur pompom on the top.
Fitted top in stretch, textured jersey made from a cotton blend. Double-layered polo neck, a concealed zip at the back and extra-long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Lined.
Pull-on trousers in soft, organic cotton corduroy with an elasticated waist, fake fly, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Umbrella with a telescopic handle and matching cover. Length 23 cm folded.
Ballet pumps with a loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles with a small heel.

Short dress in a patterned weave with a small, gathered stand-up collar and V-shaped opening at the front. Covered buttons down the front and long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs. Seam and a soft, detachable belt with metal rings at the waist. Unlined.
Wide blouse in a soft, patterned modal weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck. Long, raglan puff sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Unlined.

Calf-length wrap dress in a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a V-neck with a concealed press-stud and short sleeves. Seam and a tie belt at the waist and a gently flared skirt with concealed buttons at the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, a regular waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and side pockets. Unlined.
Hooded jumper in a soft knit with lacing at the top, dropped shoulders, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides.
Jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and tapered legs. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Short-sleeved Best Friend tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in stretch viscose jersey.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with pleats for added volume and width. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a faux fur pompom on top and earflaps with ties. Fleece lining.
Wide blouse in a lightly crêped weave with a collar, buttons down the front, short dolman sleeves and short slits in the sides. Unlined.

Suit trousers in a woven wool blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Felted coat with a small stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front, discreet pockets in the side seams and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Recycled polyester lining.

Tunic in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket and gathered seams at the shoulders. Gathered yoke at the back and narrow ties under the bust. Long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details, a back section in ventilating mesh and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs.
Fitted coat in a soft, felted wool blend with notch lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Straight-cut blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long, tapered puff sleeves with wide cuffs.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Desert boots in grained imitation leather with a decorative welt seam around the soles, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Short-sleeved body in stretch ribbed viscose jersey with a low back and lined gusset with press-studs.
Short jersey top with long sleeves and a tie at the hem.
Short-sleeved, short dress in sturdy, patterned jersey. The dress is fitted at the top and has a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in wide-wale organic cotton corduroy. Straps with adjustable buttoning at the front, an open chest pocket and elastication at the back of the waist. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y) and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved romper suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut T-shirt in jersey containing glittery threads with a turtle neck and slits in the sides.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, cropped top in cotton jersey with long sleeves, and an elastic hem with a text print.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an interactive motif on the front.
Microfibre and mesh Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Headband in a soft rib knit with a decorative knot detail at the front. Width approx. 11 cm.
Slightly shorter, boxy-style jumper in a soft knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, side pockets and tapered legs.
Top in slub jersey made from a viscose and linen blend with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a wide foldover top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a rolled, raw-edge hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Fine-knit hat in a soft cotton blend with a roll-edge hem.

Trenchcoat in woven fabric with notch lapels, a hook-and-eye fastening at the top, a loose yoke with a pleat at the back and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Tabs at the cuffs, side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Double-layered hat in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a small, sewn-on appliqué at the front of the hem.
